Name: Crime Scene
About the game: Crime Scene - 3D puzzle game in which you have to clear the room of blood and other traces of the crime. You have to play for an ordinary guy who does a specific job. Your work is connected with crime, blood and death. Perform your job duties professionally removing all traces of the crime. Make sure all evidence is destroyed and the bodies are hidden. Pull yourself together and check if you really have nerves of steel, and get ready for the next task! Use different tools to get rid of evidence and blood, but be careful - the more time passes, the more dangerous the situation becomes. Can you complete the work on time? Game Features: - Different difficulty levels - Lots of challenging levels - Beautiful graphics - Pleasant music
